rows.transcript_1:
Close your eyes.
Let's use the magic power of 3 to stay present and relax. 

Name 3 sounds you can hear right now.
Name 3 smells you can smell right now.
Name your 3 favourite foods.
What are 3 things you can be gratefful for right now.

At the end of a touch day, thinking of 3 things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.
rows.transcript_2:
Tutup mata anda.
Mari kita gunakan kuasa ajaib nombor 3 untuk kekal hadir dan bertenang.

Sebut 3 bunyi yang anda boleh dengar sekarang.
Sebut 3 bau yang anda boleh hidu sekarang.
Sebut 3 makanan kegemaran anda.
Apakah 3 perkara yang anda berasa bersyukur pada saat ini.

Di penghujung hari yang mencabar, fikirkan 3 perkara yang kita rasa beruntung dan boleh membantu kita untuk mengumpul semula semangat untuk mencuba lagi pada esok hari.
rows.title: Power of three

text_1.eng: Looking after yourself matters. And how you feel matters too!

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they do not. And sometimes we do not quite know what to think... and that is totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are hard right now. You deserve good things and @global.app_name is here to support you every step of the way.

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name wants his young children to learn about respect for their elders. His parents taught him to respect his elders and he wants his children to do the same. Letâ€™s see how @data.characters.f1_father.name and his wife, @data.characters.f1_mother.name discuss their parenting values.

character_1_text.eng: When I was playing with our kids earlier, they raised their voices at me and I was shocked.

character_2_text.eng: Hmm, maybe they were trying to tell you something with excitement.

rows.text_1_facilitator: @data.characters.f1_father.name wants his young children to learn about respect for their elders. His parents taught him to respect his elders and he wants his children to do the same. Letâ€™s see how @data.characters.f1_father.name and his wife, @data.characters.f1_mother.name discuss their parenting values.
rows.character_1_text: When I was playing with our kids earlier, they raised their voices at me and I was shocked.
rows.character_2_text: Hmm, maybe they were trying to tell you something with excitement.

character_1_text.eng: Hmm, maybe. When I was young, my parents never allowed me to speak loudly to them. It is a sign of respect for elders.

character_2_text.eng: I think that respect for elders is very important and a good tradition to pass down to our kids. We also want our kids to be open with their feelings.

character_1_text.eng: Thatâ€™s true. We can help our kids to express themselves while still being respectful.
